title: ennai eDuttALayyA
sahitya:
ennai eDuttALayyA nAn ennum unakkALaiyyA


anupallavi

  annai appA unakkenna pizhai sheidEn ArAttuyar vizhi nIr aDimalarirppeidEn


caraNam    aDutta vandavarellAm aghappaTTadai suruTTi AghAda kathai kaTTi allal izhaittanar
eDutta kAriyangaLaik-keDuttanar edirigaL eppOdum kavalaiyil Engi unaik-kUvinEn
